rows.name: Haughty
rows.description: The less learned irritate you, which is practically everybody. Reduce your Fellowship by 5.

rows.name: Daemon's Advocate
rows.description: You're compelled to argue. If you allow an opinion to go unchallenged, take a -10 penalty to all Willpower tests for 24 hours.

rows.name: Just Heart
rows.description: Injustice is anathema to you. Whenever you see it, you must speak out unless you pass a Difficult Willpower Test.

rows.name: Piercing Gaze
rows.description: Like Verena, you see all. Gain a +10 bonus to Perception tests involving sight, but take a -10 penalty to Charm tests.

rows.name: Verena's Mien
rows.description: With straight back and clear eyes, you grow 1d10/2 inches and increase your Intelligence by 5.

rows.name: Owl Friend
rows.description: Gain a +20 bonus on Charm Animal tests when dealing with owls.

rows.name: Eidetic Memory
rows.description: Nothing escapes your mind once it's there. Gain the Tower of Memories Talent.

rows.name: Voice of Wisdom
rows.description: Verena Herself speaks through you. Double the number of people you can affect with a Charm Test.

rows.name: Enlightened
rows.description: You gain just a fragment of Verena's vast knowledge. You gain a +10 bonus to any and all Lore Skill Tests you have. Lore Skill Tests you do not have may still be attempted with a -20 penalty.

rows.name: Marked by Verena
rows.description: A symbol of Verena appears as a mark somewhere on your body (roll 1d100 for Hit Location). You gain +10 bonus to Pray tests when using Miracles of Verena, and +10 bonus to Fellowship tests when dealing with other followers of Verena if they can see the mark.
